name: Immigrate to Mato Grosso
description: Mato Grosso is Brazil's third-largest state by area in the Central-West region, featuring diverse ecosystems like the Pantanal wetland and Cerrado, with a focus on agriculture (soy, maize, cotton), cattle ranching, and tourism in national parks.
keywords: Mato Grosso, Pantanal, Cerrado, agriculture, soy production, Chapada dos Guimarães, Cuiabá
